unnormalised: **Energy & Utilities: Solar Rooftop Subsidies Sparking Joy in Indian Homes!**
normalised: **Energy and Utilities: Solar Rooftop Subsidies Sparking Joy in Indian Homes!**

unnormalised: Guess what, folks? The Ministry of New and Renewable Energy (MNRE) is showering us with solar rooftop subsidies, and folks are lining up like it's free chai!
normalised: Guess what, folks? The Ministry of New and Renewable Energy (M N R E) is showering us with solar rooftop subsidies, and folks are lining up like it's free chai!

unnormalised: Word on the street in cities like Delhi and Mumbai is that families are saving BIG TIME on their electricity bills. Dr. Sharma from IIT Madras says the subsidies are a "game-changer" for promoting green energy in India.
normalised: Word on the street in cities like Delhi and Mumbai is that families are saving big time on their electricity bills. Doctor Sharma from I I T Madras says the subsidies are a "game-changer" for promoting green energy in India.

unnormalised: The scheme offers subsidies up to 40% for systems up to 3kW and 20% beyond that. Mrs. Patel in Ahmedabad just got a 5kW system installed and is already bragging about her savings! She even claims her neighbours are jealous!
normalised: The scheme offers subsidies up to forty percent for systems up to three kilowatt and twenty percent beyond that. Missus Patel in Ahmedabad just got a five kilowatt system installed and is already bragging about her savings! She even claims her neighbours are jealous!

unnormalised: These subsidies, coupled with net metering, mean you can sell excess power back to the grid, making it a sweet deal. Think of it as turning your roof into a mini power plant!
normalised: These subsidies, coupled with net metering, mean you can sell excess power back to the grid, making it a sweet deal. Think of it as turning your roof into a mini power plant!

unnormalised: Worried about space? Even a relatively small rooftop of around 250 sq ft can host a decent solar setup.
normalised: Worried about space? Even a relatively small rooftop of around two hundred and fifty square feet can host a decent solar setup.

unnormalised: The application process is now streamlined through the national portal, making it easier than ever. So, ditch that electricity bill anxiety and embrace the sun!
normalised: The application process is now streamlined through the national portal, making it easier than ever. So, ditch that electricity bill anxiety and embrace the sun!

unnormalised: Apply soon, as these subsidies are like Diwali sweets - they won't last forever! The government has allocated Rs. 5,000 crore for this phase, so get your slice of the pie.
normalised: Apply soon, as these subsidies are like Diwali sweets - they won't last forever! The government has allocated rupees five thousand crore for this phase, so get your slice of the pie.
